text.section: A lessor may not bring a court action to recover property subject to a rental-purchase agreement until 15 days after the consumer has been sent notice of a default.
Notice of default sent by certified mail to the consumer's last known address constitutes notice.
The notice shall include any amount the consumer must pay to reinstate the rental-purchase agreement, if applicable.
